entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
